Controls how aggressively Cloudflare cac: Mengontrol seberapa agresif Cloudflare menyimpan konten Anda dalam cache.
Controls how Cloudflare connects to your: Mengontrol bagaimana Cloudflare terhubung ke asal Anda.

Skip reverse DNS lookups to speed up top: Skip reverse DNS lookups to speed up topology loading.
